name: LogiTrucks
description:
Overview

LogiTrucks is a minimalistic and relaxing puzzle game for Windows. It's about delivering packages.

You just need to place arrows all over the isometric tile-based maps to guide the delivery trucks on their journey from the factories to the warehouses. Sounds simple, right? It gets pretty hard as you progress through the 52 levels, I can promise. :)

Features

  • Simple gameplay with intuitive controls
  • 52 levels, increasing difficulty
  • Stylish art design
  • Chill music and sfx

Beta test is still ongoing! 

If you want to help the project, read the detailed instructions or just grab the game here and send me feedback I would really appreciate it!

Support page & Twitter
